com.enjin.sdk.events

Annotation Type EventFilter


  • @Retention(value=RUNTIME)
 @Target(value=TYPE)
public @interface EventFilter
    Indicates the events to be filtered by the type. This annotation is intended to be used on the NotificationListener class type.
    See Also:
    NotificationListener

    • Required Element Summary

      Required Elements 
      Modifier and Type Required Element and Description
      EventType[] value
      Event types used by the filter.

    • Optional Element Summary

      Optional Elements 
      Modifier and Type Optional Element and Description
      boolean allow
      Whether the filtered types are whitelisted or blacklisted.

    • Element Detail

      • value

        public abstract EventType[] value
        Event types used by the filter.
        Returns:
        the filtered types

      • allow

        public abstract boolean allow
        Whether the filtered types are whitelisted or blacklisted.
        Returns:
        true if the types are handled, else types are ignored
        Default:
        true
